diseases.name: Malaria
diseases.explanation: Malaria is likely because the patient has fever, chills, and joint pain, which are common malaria symptoms.

diseases.name: Typhoid
diseases.explanation: Typhoid is suspected due to prolonged fever, stomach pain, and rash.

diseases.name: Pneumonia
diseases.explanation: Pneumonia is indicated by cough, fever, chest pain, and difficulty breathing.

diseases.name: Common Cold
diseases.explanation: Common cold is likely due to sneezing, cough, and sore throat.

diseases.name: Dengue
diseases.explanation: Dengue is suspected because of high fever, headache, and joint pain.

diseases.name: Chickenpox
diseases.explanation: Chickenpox is likely due to fever and the characteristic itchy rash.

diseases.name: Measles
diseases.explanation: Measles is suspected because of high fever, rash, and respiratory symptoms.

diseases.name: Hepatitis A
diseases.explanation: Hepatitis A is likely due to jaundice, fatigue, and gastrointestinal symptoms.

diseases.name: Hepatitis B
diseases.explanation: Hepatitis B is suspected due to jaundice, fatigue, and liver-related symptoms.

diseases.name: Urinary Tract Infection
diseases.explanation: UTI is likely due to burning sensation while urinating and frequent urination.

diseases.name: Influenza
diseases.explanation: Influenza is likely due to fever, cough, body aches, and fatigue.

diseases.name: Tuberculosis
diseases.explanation: TB is suspected due to chronic cough, night sweats, and weight loss.

diseases.name: Cholera
diseases.explanation: Cholera is indicated by severe diarrhea and dehydration.

diseases.name: Food Poisoning
diseases.explanation: Food poisoning is suspected due to sudden onset nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea.

diseases.name: Mumps
diseases.explanation: Mumps is likely due to swollen salivary glands and fever.

diseases.name: Whooping Cough
diseases.explanation: Pertussis is suspected because of characteristic coughing fits and whooping sound.

diseases.name: Chikungunya
diseases.explanation: Chikungunya is suspected due to fever and severe joint pain.

diseases.name: Yellow Fever
diseases.explanation: Yellow Fever is likely due to fever, jaundice, and muscle pain.

diseases.name: Typhus
diseases.explanation: Typhus is suspected due to fever, rash, and headache.

diseases.name: HIV/AIDS
diseases.explanation: HIV/AIDS is suspected due to recurrent infections and weight loss.

diseases.name: Skin Infection
diseases.explanation: Skin infection is likely due to redness, swelling, and pus formation.

diseases.name: Ear Infection
diseases.explanation: Ear infection is suspected due to ear pain, fluid, and fever.

diseases.name: Conjunctivitis
diseases.explanation: Conjunctivitis is likely due to red eyes, itching, and discharge.

diseases.name: Bronchitis
diseases.explanation: Bronchitis is suspected due to persistent cough and mucus production.

diseases.name: Asthma Attack
diseases.explanation: Asthma attack is indicated by wheezing, shortness of breath, and chest tightness.

diseases.name: Diabetes Mellitus
diseases.explanation: Diabetes is suspected due to frequent urination, excessive thirst, and weight loss.

diseases.name: Hypertension
diseases.explanation: Hypertension is likely due to high blood pressure symptoms such as headache and dizziness.

diseases.name: Stroke
diseases.explanation: Stroke is suspected due to sudden neurological deficits.

diseases.name: Heart Attack
diseases.explanation: Heart attack is indicated by chest pain, sweating, and nausea.

diseases.name: Gastroenteritis
diseases.explanation: Gastroenteritis is likely due to diarrhea, vomiting, and stomach cramps.

diseases.name: Appendicitis
diseases.explanation: Appendicitis is suspected due to localized abdominal pain and fever.

diseases.name: Migraine
diseases.explanation: Migraine is likely due to severe headache with light and sound sensitivity.

diseases.name: Anemia
treatments: Vitamin B12 or folate if deficient
diseases.explanation: Anemia is suspected due to fatigue, pale skin, and dizziness.

diseases.name: Rheumatoid Arthritis
diseases.explanation: Rheumatoid Arthritis is likely due to joint pain, swelling, and morning stiffness.

diseases.name: Osteoarthritis
diseases.explanation: Osteoarthritis is suspected due to chronic joint pain and reduced movement.

diseases.name: Alzheimer's Disease
diseases.explanation: Alzheimer's is suspected due to progressive memory loss and confusion.

diseases.name: Parkinson's Disease
diseases.explanation: Parkinson's is likely due to tremors, rigidity, and slowness of movement.

diseases.name: Epilepsy
diseases.explanation: Epilepsy is suspected due to recurrent seizures and jerking movements.

diseases.name: Hypothyroidism
diseases.explanation: Hypothyroidism is likely due to fatigue, weight gain, and cold intolerance.

diseases.name: Hyperthyroidism
diseases.explanation: Hyperthyroidism is suspected due to rapid heartbeat, weight loss, and tremors.

diseases.name: Ebola
diseases.explanation: Ebola is suspected due to fever, vomiting, diarrhea, and bleeding symptoms.

diseases.name: Zika Virus
diseases.explanation: Zika virus is likely due to fever, rash, and joint pain.

diseases.name: Leishmaniasis
diseases.explanation: Leishmaniasis is suspected due to skin ulcers and systemic symptoms like fever and weight loss.

diseases.name: Schistosomiasis
diseases.explanation: Schistosomiasis is likely due to abdominal pain, blood in urine, and diarrhea.

diseases.name: Filariasis
diseases.explanation: Filariasis is suspected due to limb swelling and lymphatic system involvement.

diseases.name: Rabies
diseases.explanation: Rabies is likely due to hydrophobia, salivation, and neurological symptoms.

diseases.name: Leprosy
diseases.explanation: Leprosy is suspected due to skin lesions and nerve damage symptoms.

diseases.name: Polio
diseases.explanation: Polio is suspected due to muscle weakness and paralysis following fever.
